ValidationRule.description: For Outbound when attempt date is entered, the corresponding status is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), ISPICKVAL(ESR_Team__c ,'Outbound Service'), OR( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(X1st_Attempt_Date__c )),ISBLANK(TEXT( X1st_Attempt_Status__c))), AND(NOT(ISBLANK( X2nd_Attempt_Date__c )),ISBLANK(TEXT( X2nd_Attempt__c))), AND(NOT(ISBLANK( X3rd_Attempt_Date__c )),ISBLANK(TEXT( X3rd_Attempt_Status__c)))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If a Call Attempt is made, the corresponding status must be entered.
